span.p: Itineris is an early college high school that helps students plan for college and career.

div.p: Itineris Early College High School is a 10th-12th grade charter high school that blends a small, STEM school environment with the opportunity for students to earn up to two years of college credit. Consistently recognized as one of the best high schools in Utah, Itineris focuses on using technology to help students achieve their potential. Come join a school where relationships truly matter.

At Itineris we strive to provide a unique high school experience. Blending high school and college education allows us to give our students access to better tools, focused curriculum, and college and career preparation.

ul.li: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM) Focused Curriculum

div.h3: College and High School Course Options

div.p: The mission of Itineris Early College High School is to create a learning community that inspires high expectations, supports cognitive challenges, and encourages self-discovery and civic responsibility to maximize individual potential.
Do you want to save up to $8000.00 in college costs? Are you interested in technology, math, and science? If so...

p.span: Congratulations to Emily Wagstaff, Itineris graduate (Class of 2017)! Emily recently graduated from the University of Utah and will be heading out of state to pursue a doctoral degree in occupational therapy. Way to go, Emily! We love hearing from alumni. What are the rest of you up to?ðŸ˜Š
Itineris is ranked #7 best high school in Utah in 2020 by U.S. News! www.usnews.com/education/best-high-schools/utah
Clarification to yesterday's post: the Main Office will be open Monday-Thursday (closed Friday) this week from 10am-12pm.

div.section:
Visit Us
Itineris Early College High School
8714 Roy Del Circle
West Jordan, UT 84088
Located near the red line on Trax and just across the street from Salt Lake Community College Jordan Campus. Students can utilize Trax with the free pass that is included in registration fees.
